data.text: @davidhedleytodd @RuthieRehh @Sozzinski Really don’t know what to believe anymore. So very sad not knowing who I can trust enough in my life to be authentic. I’m tired
@Sozzinski @RuthieRehh The first casualty of war is truth.
@orgogg I retweeted this at some point and said something like: 'If only 50% of this is true I'd still believe it 40% more than our MSM'. But yes, it may well be.
@Sozzinski The trouble is, half of that is likely also disinformation. It works both ways.
@Sozzinski And the flats that were hit were empty, having been evacuated. Also, why was there a webcam in a lounge, facing the windown, on the 8th floor? Not much chance of being burgled!
